title: LOCManager's wallet contract defines a basic implementation of DepositWalletInterface to provide a way to store/deposit/withdraw tokens on this contract according to access rights. Here deposit/withdraw are allowed only by LOCManager contract.
name: LOCWallet

abiDocs.name: init
abiDocs.notice: Initializes contract with its ready-to-use state

abiDocs.name: fallbackAsset
abiDocs.details: Designed to check if a wallet supports fallback interface. Should be simple and return `true` or `false` depending on wether a contract wants to support this interface or not.
abiDocs.return: `true` if a contract (wallet) supports fallback interface, `false` otherwise

abiDocs.name: fallbackAssetPassOwnership
abiDocs.details: Helper method to provide a way to pass ownership of the platform after all operations are done to its real owner.
abiDocs.return: `true` if passing ownership is successful, `false` otherwise

abiDocs.name: claimContractOwnership
abiDocs.notice: Finalize ownership pass.     * Can only be called by pending owner.

inputs.name: _identifier
inputs.description: is a manager's identifier. 0x0 is not allowed.

abiDocs.name: lookupManager
abiDocs.details: Returns manager's address by its identifier (type).
abiDocs.notice: Will crash if no manager in the system with given identifier.

inputs.name: _from
inputs.description: destination of calling. Contract that will be proposed to be called with data

abiDocs.name: fallbackAssetInvoke
abiDocs.details: Defines main operation that will be performed throughout fallback interface. This method will be invoked only in case if `fallbackAsset` returns `true`. Purpose is to delegate invocation of any method that contract is allowed to call to a token extension.

inputs.name: _to
inputs.description: address of the next owner. 0x0 is not allowed.

abiDocs.name: changeContractOwnership
abiDocs.notice: Prepares ownership pass.     * Can only be called by current owner.

inputs.name: _symbol
inputs.description: asset that is registered in a platform and needed to be revoked

inputs.name: _amount
inputs.description: a number of tokens to revoke

abiDocs.name: revoke
abiDocs.notice: Performs revokation of an asset in provided platform for a specified amount.

abiDocs.name: setContractsManager
abiDocs.details: Setter for ContractsManager. Force overrides currect manager.

abiDocs.name: destroy
abiDocs.details: Reverts all actions when this method was invoked
abiDocs.notice: Forbidden to invoke this implementation of destroy method. See another one which takes tokens' addresses

inputs.name: _from
inputs.description: an address of a sender who is willing to transfer her resources

inputs.name: _amount
inputs.description: an amount of tokens (resources) a sender wants to transfer

abiDocs.name: deposit
abiDocs.notice: Deposits some amount of tokens on wallet's account using ERC20 tokens

abiDocs.name: transferContractOwnership
abiDocs.details: Direct ownership pass without change/claim pattern. Can be invoked only by current contract owner

inputs.name: _symbol
inputs.description: asset that is registered in a platform and needed to be reissued

inputs.name: _amount
inputs.description: a number of tokens to reissue

abiDocs.name: reissue
abiDocs.notice: Performs reissuing of an asset in provided platform for a specified amount.

abiDocs.name: destroy
abiDocs.notice: Allows contract owner to destroy a contract and withdraw all tokens associated with this address to a message sender

inputs.name: _to
inputs.description: an address of a receiver who is willing to get stored resources

inputs.name: _amount
inputs.description: an amount of tokens (resources) a receiver wants to get

abiDocs.name: withdraw
abiDocs.notice: Withdraws some amount of tokens from wallet's account using ERC20 tokens
